text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
This…! This is an incredible development! The girl who 
betrayed her companions rejoins them once more—!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Honestly… you could have told me all this from the beginning!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Do not jest. To fool thine enemies, first thou foolst thine allies. 
Truth told, thine acting skills are nonexistent, no?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Mgrrh… I cannot refute what you just… said!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Naa-ha-hah-haa! Was my message helpful?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wooaah～～! I knew you went to spy♪ Welcome baaack～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I thought it was strange, but seriously! You went overboard!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: No Reasooon! What you did was really naughty. Haah～ I'm just glad that we have everyone back♪

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
My sisters in steel～～! I have uncovered the location of 
the Ro clan's banner! Their general, Oguri, is there also!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Wha—!? You really pulled one this time! I won't let you go, 
we got reinforcements on the way already!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Oh hoo, the lot that was with me just moments ago? If so, then they should be heading in the wholly opposite direction by now.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: For I gave your clan nooothing but false information♪

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: WH-WHAAAAAAT～～～!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
You really are quite the character…! 'Tis an awfully 
drastic action you took. That said, it must be what it 
means to "go for the win".

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
It pains me to say this… but thanks to you I remembered 
what it took to dive into the flames.

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
How forthright～ I know nothing about all that, nor do I care. 
I merely act whichever way pleases me, and require no reason!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
I only wish to win! History is written by the victors! 
Hence, change of strategy! Follow me, you lot!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
We aim for their stronghold! Charge along the shortest route! 
Toward General Oguriiii, toward their banneeeerrr—!!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: Hwooooooooooooh!!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ha! Like hell we'd let you do that! 
You got us and Gim here to deal with!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Of course that would be their reaction～ 
But… we're here too!

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text: Yaeno! Go on ahead!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I am counting on you! We will defeat them with certainty!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Wahh, this is bad～ But… I don't want to lose either…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
'Cause we all gave our best up to now. All that hardship… 
Since we came this far, we want to win, don't we?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: So just for once, I want to create a miracle! Eeeeeeyy!!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: I found them! Hold it～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It's one after another! Both of you, keep going!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Taishin…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You don't have to worry about each and every thing. 
That's just how this game works. Strategically, it's 
okay if I fall here. ……You better win!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Definitely! I promise!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
We have to win. If we don't, I wouldn't 
be able to face Hayahide…!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa, haah… Yaeno, just a little further!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Indeed…! We will win, we have to. Hahh, haa…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Yes…! Hehehe… It might be funny hearing 
this now… but this reminds me of racing.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I want to win against her… I start trying harder whenever I think that…

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Hah… I understand that. But that alone won't shorten the distance…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
That's right. That's why, like today, sometimes I start burning up 
more and more, because if we don't go for it ——

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— Then we won't grasp victory…!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Yaeno Muteki and Super Creek are diving straight in! 
Oguri Cap has taken notice and prepares for battle!

text_block_list.name: [Ro Clan] Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Stop right there, Yaeno Muteki! 
I'll take you down here—!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Yaeno! Hup!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Super Creek has just protected Yaeno Muteki! 
She's still running! Yaeno Muteki!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Come on, go win it!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Oguri! Ready yourself! Taaaaaa——!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
—— !! Both generals are fighting one-on-one… 
This will be settled right here…

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The winner is Yaeno Muteki! With only one life left, she achieves 
a huge turnabout victory at the last moment～!

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Amazing… they actually did it! No matter how many times 
they got in a predicament… through all the times I thought 
they were done for……

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: They actually brought about an uprising…!
Thus, the chaos of the Clan Clash came to an end.

Having splendidly defeated both favored teams, the gallant 
display of the I clan's horsegirls stirred feelings of excitement 
and inspiration in the audience. Later that evening ——

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on unifying the land～～!

text_block_list.name: [I Clan] Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: — Waaaaaaah! We really did it! — That was amazing～! Everyone really gave their best～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What a racket… how do they have so much energy left over. Aah-ah, I could sleep all day tomorrow…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Eheheh, me too. Shall we sleep in together～?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Everyone, thank you very much for following me. …Ahem. Though I have been a poor general, thanks to all of you, we've been honoured with this victory……

text_block_list.name: No Reason
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat art thou even muttering about again!! 
Come now! Leave the formalities and get on with it!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Nnn! But, the victory speech is a part of the general's duties. Displaying proper etiquette and manners is the foundation of…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha～ But everyone's already starving, so make it brief, will you～

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
Well then… for our team's victory and the safety of everyone 
involved, I would like to express my gratitude and appreciation.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
(I will never forget the intensity of today. It has been ingrained 
in my heart that if one wants to win, at times one will need to 
act with fervor and aggression.)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
To aim high and take that first step. 
'Tis that courage that will lead me to the top.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
My distinguished rivals, you had better prepare yourselves. 
For my next uprising will be in a race—!
